Posts.Content: I had breast cancer and smoked all the way through my doc told me it would be too much stress to quit at the time of going through treatment and advised me just to cut down have a smoke when and if you really need one other docs told me to stop and stressed at me but I found just having a smoke when I needed it kept me calm and now I have finished my treatment I stopped with the help of just cutting down further good luck x
Posts.Title: BC and smoking

Posts.Content: Thanks great help to me love swimming and hopefully I can get back in the water now thanks x
Posts.Title: Beanie boobie

Posts.Content: Hi my advise is go for the chemo I never had it in my nodes and went for chemo so glad I did as the chance of it spreading was high like others have said its a year of your life to put to one side and yes it's hard but with great support and being positive you can get through it and have your whole life in front of you keep smiling even in the rough times go for it grab it kick it out good luck xxxxx
